select ic.comment_level commentLevel , ic.content content, ic.sepc_name as specName, ic.created_time as createTime, u.face as userFace, u.nickname as nickname from items_comments ic left join users u on u.id = ic.user_id where ic.item_id = #{paramsMap.itemId}
and ic.comment_level = #{paramsMap.level}

select i.item_name as itemName, i.id as itemId, i.sell_counts as sellCounts, ii.url as imgUrl, tempSpec.price_discount as price from items i left join items_img ii on i.id = ii.item_id left join (select item_id, MIN(price_discount) as price_discount from items_spec group by item_id) tempSpec on i.id = tempSpec.item_id where ii.is_main = 1
and i.item_name like '%${paramsMap.keywards}%'
order by
i.sell_counts desc tempSpec.price_discount asc i.item_name asc
